question.question_text: Are you an athlete, coach or referee?
Have you placed top 3 at the Olympics or first in the Asian Games or a World Championship?
Have you been a national team coach, or had someone you coached achieve top 3 at the Olympics or first in the Asian Games or a World Championship?
Did you referee a match at the Olympics, Asian Games or equivalent?
Are you a lawyer?
Was your most recent monthly salary >160k TWD?
Are you an architect?
Do you have an architect license, or at least five years of design or contructions experience working at a firm AND a position with most recent monthly salary of at least 160k NT?
Are you an Executive or GM?
Do you run a financial firm?
Do you run the Taiwan R&D centre, Taiwan branch office or HQ of a multinational?
Have you run a film, broadcast, or pop music organisation for at least 5 years?
Do you work in the Finance industry?
Are you a  CFA,CFP, FRM, CIIA, CIA, PRM, FSA, FCAS, FIA, FIAA, SEI-KAIIN etc?

Do you have 5 years experience in FinTech, or finance related to another innovative field?
Do you have a PhD?
Is it from a "top 200" university?
Is it in science and technology? Have you worked in the field for more than 4 years?
Is your field unique science and technology field and lacking in Taiwan?
Have you won an international award, worked in your field for more than 4 years and filed a published a patent or journal paper?
Is your PhD related to the publishing industry and you have received an important international award?
